'''Redstone Specialists Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160301004450/http://mojang.com/2016/02/minecraft-0140-is-out-repeaters-maps-redstone-specialists-livestream-and-more/|title=Minecraft 0.14.0 is out! Skin Pack, livestream and more!|author=Daniel Kaplan|date=February 18, 2016|website=Mojang.com}}</ref><ref>{{Cite|url= https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2016/02/18/overworld-update-redstone-specialist-skins-now-powering-up-minecraft/|title=Overworld Update & Redstone Specialist Skins Now Powering-Up Minecraft|author=Rebecca Gordius|date=February 18, 2016|website=Xbox Wire}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 15 skins themed around skins that specialize in, work with, or are otherwise involved with [[redstone]]. On the occasion of this skin pack's release, a free downloadable world called [[Redstone Puzzle Map]] was publicized.
